org.settings4j.contentresolver

Class FilteredContentResolverWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.settings4j.contentresolver.FilteredContentResolverWrapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ContentResolver

    public class FilteredContentResolverWrapper
extends Object
implements ContentResolver
    Wrapper to add a Filter which is used before the given ContentResolver is called.
    Author:
    Harald.Brabenetz

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FilteredContentResolverWrapper(ContentResolver targetContentResolver, Filter filter) 

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addContentResolver(ContentResolver contentResolver)
      Some Implementations of a ContentResolver are delegating the functionality to other ContentResolvers.
      byte[] getContent(String key)
      Reads the Content for the given Key or null if nothing where found.

    • Constructor Detail

      • FilteredContentResolverWrapper

        public FilteredContentResolverWrapper(ContentResolver targetContentResolver,
                                      Filter filter)
        Parameters:
        targetContentResolver - The ContentResolver where the settings should be read if the Filter allows it.
        filter - the Filter which defines if an key should be read from the given ContentResolver.

    • Method Detail

      • addContentResolver

        public void addContentResolver(ContentResolver contentResolver)
        Description copied from interface: ContentResolver
        Some Implementations of a ContentResolver are delegating the functionality to other ContentResolvers.

        Examples are: UnionContentResolver 

         --------------------------------------
 <contentResolver name="DefaultContentResolver" class="org.settings4j.contentresolver.UnionContentResolver">
     <contentResolver-ref ref="FSContentResolver" />
     <contentResolver-ref ref="ClasspathContentResolver" />
 </contentResolver>
 --------------------------------------
        Specified by:
        addContentResolver in interface ContentResolver
        Parameters:
        contentResolver - the original contentResolver to delegate.

      • getContent

        public byte[] getContent(String key)
        Description copied from interface: ContentResolver
        Reads the Content for the given Key or null if nothing where found.
        Specified by:
        getContent in interface ContentResolver
        Parameters:
        key - The key
        Returns:
        The byte[] Content or null if nothing where found.
